Name: The Pointless Car Chase
About the game: The epic original that'll leave you scratching your head and saying, 'what?'. The first game of R.E.M. Studios - jump into the past, and relive the real-est car chase simulator the internet has to offer. Original Description: The Pointless Car Chase, the game you have been waiting for! You are a wanted criminal stranded on an abandoned stunt island and the only way to survive is to drive, fast. Dodge the never ending horde of police cars and speed towards ramps in your attempt to stay alive. Note: This is a historical item â€” the first game by R.E.M. Studios. For this reason, it will not be updated, so it can be preserved in all of its perfection.
